name: Dragon Hunter: Deadly Island G
description:
Dragon Hunter: Deadly Island Game is a real thrill and fun game, find the dragons and shoot them to kill. Its a survival game where you need to kill the dragon by shooting with a sniper gun.
Game Features:
Actual experience of dragons.
Awesome graphics and forest environment.
More than 60 thrilling levels with different number of dragons and tasks.
Awesome game play with great animations.
Easy and Smooth First person shooter (FPS gun game) guns.
